$$ 
H(s) = \frac{s + 9}{s^2 + 10s + 2}
$$

```{r, echo = FALSE}
Fs <- function(s) (s+9)/(s^2+10*s+2)
pulsLi <- invlap(Fs, 0, 2*pi, 100)

Fs <- function(s) (1/s) * ((s+9)/(s^2+10*s+2))
stepLi <- invlap(Fs, 0, 2*pi, 100)

x_zero <- c(-9)
y_zero <- c(0)
x_pole <- rep(-sqrt(102),2)
y_pole <- c(1,-1)
pole_zero_plot(x_zero, y_zero, x_pole, y_pole,12)
lines(pulsLi,col="Blue")
lines(stepLi,col="red")
```
